title: 18. What we do when we're sick- Chatting natural home remedies with my sister Laura
description:
Why is it so hard for me to talk about our family's approach toward medicine and sickness? Because this topic is controversial and harbors a lot of strong opinions. Even still, I hope most of you can take this as some good old-fashioned advice from two moms (with six kids total!) who just have their experience to share!

Follow along with Our Oily House: 

The blog

The Youtube channel

Instagram

Follow along with Farmhouse on Boone:

The blog

The Youtube channel

Instagram

Thanks again for listening and I'll see you in the next episode of the Simple Farmhouse Life podcast.
